abstract_summ: Italy was the first European country hit by the COVID-19 pandemic . Forty-eight of the 233 patients followed up for a median of 40 days (interquartile range 33-47) died during the follow-up . Age (adjusted hazard ratio [aHR] 2.08, 95% CI 1.48-2.92 per ten years more) and obesity (aHR) independently associated with an increased risk of death .
